ZCL_NextElement_t Struct Reference

Type describing information which is necessary for put/get element to/from payload. More...

#include <zcl.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t id
 Element's ID. Can be either ZCL_GeneralCommandId_t value or a special cluster command ID.
uint8_t payloadLength
 Payload's length after adding of a new element.
uint8_t * payload
 Payload's pointer to the place where an element is added.
void * content
 Pointer to content (memory) which shall be added/filled to/from the payload.

Detailed Description

Type describing information which is necessary for put/get element to/from payload.
